body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, attorney. Illinois native. Son of Martha Fry Bell and David Bell. Student in Boyle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850. Attorney in Boyle County in 1863. County attorney in Boyle County in 1864.
